attributes.action: Adopt section 90 of the current London Local Authorities Bill as national legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rogue traders often attempt to evade their legal duties and their outraged customers by hiding behind mail box/forwarding services.  

Currently there is no specific requirement for service providers to maintain records of such details, nor to verify them, leading to considerable consumer detriment. 

Implementation of this legislation would  reduce the risks for consumers and parallel business names requirements in the Companies Acts
